techmeme.title: Sources: the EC later in July will suggest scrapping the €150 threshold below which goods are exempt from customs duties, targeting Temu, AliExpress, and Shein (Financial Times)

How an underground network of Chinese sellers is bypassing US export controls through supply-chain blind spots to smuggle Nvidia's advanced AI chips into China (Raffaele Huang/Wall Street Journal)
